details:
The VR Gaming Zone is an interactive entertainment event where participants can experience Virtual Reality games using professionally rented VR headsets. Users can enter immersive virtual worlds and enjoy exciting games by paying a nominal usage fee.
Participants will be given time-based access to VR games, including action, adventure, and simulation experiences. Each session is supervised to ensure safe handling of equipment and smooth gameplay for all users.
This event is designed purely for fun, engagement, and exposure to VR technology, making it suitable for beginners and first-time VR users. The VR Gaming Zone offers a thrilling experience and a chance to explore next-generation gaming in a simple and affordable way.

Get ready to defuse the challenge in Circuit Bombing, an electrifying technical event at ASWAMEDHA 2026! âš¡
Test your logic, speed, and circuit skills in intense, time-bound challenges where every connection counts. Analyze circuits, fix faults under pressure, and race against the clock to survive each round.

Think smart, wire right, and win exciting prizes. Register now and prove your circuit mastery!

Sumo Wrestling is a thrilling test of balance, strength, and strategy, inspired by the traditional Japanese sport. The competition takes place inside a circular ring, where two participants face off with a single objective: force the opponent out of the ring or make them touch the ground with any part of the body other than the feet.

Infinity castle is an exhilarating technical event designed to test your skills, creativity, and problem-solving abilities. With four intense rounds  participants must complete technical tasks within strict  time limits to advance. Each round increases in difficulty, pushing you to think critically and perform under pressure. The event is a thrilling mix of competition and innovation, offering a platform to showcase your expertise. Are you ready to take on the challenge and emerge victorious

This workshop introduces the basics of FPGA technology, covering core digital components such as multiplexers, adders, and ALUs. Participants will learn fundamental FPGA concepts along with hands-on implementation of simple digital circuits. Ideal for beginners looking to gain practical experience in digital design.

event_name: RekhaChitram - an interactive intro to digital design for beginners.
details:

Expect real-time practice, creative exploration, and practical tips you can apply to projects, presentations, and social media ðŸš€
IoT workshop by IEI is a hands-on training program where participants learn to build, connect, and program smart devices, exploring IoT concepts.
Competitive event where participants work intensively in teams over a set period to design, build, and present a functional solution to a predefined challenge or a real-world problem.

FIFA Fever is an exciting football-themed event conducted as part of the college tech fest, inspired by the global spirit of FIFA. The event brings together football enthusiasts to participate in engaging activities, games, and challenges that test their knowledge, skills, and passion for the sport. FIFA Fever aims to create a lively and competitive atmosphere while promoting teamwork, sportsmanship, and entertainment among participants.

Shootout: 3v3 
It all comes down to this 3v3 shootout. Game tied.
The pitch goes silent as the six players line up. There's no room for error; success hinges on absolute precision against the mini post.
Each team fields three players, and every individual takes two high-pressure shots:

âš½ Player 1: Two attempts.
âš½ Player 2: Two attempts.
âš½ Player 3: The final two shots for the win.

Six shots total. Six moments that decide the champions. Thread the needle or go home. The pressure is immense. Who has the nerve to clinch the win?
